ValidationRule.description: Validate that the tissue is not eligible when setting a credit amount.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( Tissue_Eligibility_Status__c ,'Eligible'), ISPICKVAL( Tissue_Eligibility_Status__c ,'') ), Credit_Amount__c > 0, NOT($Setup.Americord_Settings__c.Bypass_Validation_Rule__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must set the Tissue Eligibility to Ineligible when setting a credit amount.
